tutorials.name: What is Policy as Code with Sentinel?
tutorials.description: Learn how policy as code lets you define, version, test, and deploy policies  in a safe, consistent, and repeatable way. Try Sentinel.

product.name: Sentinel
product.description: Learn about policy as code with HashiCorp Sentinel.

tutorials.name: Install Sentinel
tutorials.description: Install Sentinel on Mac, Linux, or Windows by downloading the binary, then verify you installed Sentinel successfully.

product.name: Sentinel
product.description: Learn about policy as code with HashiCorp Sentinel.

tutorials.name: Write your first policy
tutorials.description: Create a basic Sentinel policy for HashiCups to validate coffee orders.  Define rules, use conditional logic, and test the policy using the Sentinel  CLI. Learn the fundamentals of policy structure and evaluation.

product.name: Sentinel
product.description: Learn about policy as code with HashiCorp Sentinel.

tutorials.name: Simplify policy logic with Sentinel function
tutorials.description: Enhance the HashiCups policy by implementing reusable functions. Refactor the  policy to handle multiple items in an order, create parameterized validation  functions, and understand how functions improve code organization and  maintainability.

product.name: Sentinel
product.description: Learn about policy as code with HashiCorp Sentinel.

tutorials.name: Centralize and share policy components with Sentinel modules
tutorials.description: Create a Sentinel module to centralize common variables and functions for  HashiCups policies. Learn how to import and use modules, update policies to  leverage shared components, and understand the benefits of modularization in  policy development.

product.name: Sentinel
product.description: Learn about policy as code with HashiCorp Sentinel.

tutorials.name: Integrate external data with Sentinel static imports
tutorials.description: Incorporate external JSON data into HashiCups policies using Sentinel static  imports. Configure static imports in sentinel.hcl, update policies to use  imported data, and explore the advantages of separating data from policy logic.

product.name: Sentinel
product.description: Learn about policy as code with HashiCorp Sentinel.

tutorials.name: Test Sentinel policies
tutorials.description: Develop a comprehensive test suite for HashiCups Sentinel policies. Create  test cases for various scenarios, use mock data to simulate different inputs,  and run tests using the Sentinel CLI. Learn best practices for ensuring policy reliability and correctness.

product.name: Sentinel
product.description: Learn about policy as code with HashiCorp Sentinel.

metadata.title: Sentinel by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Sentinel is a language and framework for policy built to be embedded in existing software to enable fine-grained, logic-based policy decisions.
